article_title: 2013: The Year in Media Bloopers, Gaffes, and Other Hot Messes
article_text:
‘Tis the season to plow through list after list of year-end recaps, and in the news business, this can be a grim, joyless task at times. The unpredictability of television news has left us with many a harrowing, heartbreaking, devastating image this year. That same unpredictability, however, sometimes leads to moments of levity, and shocks that are more entertaining than frightening.

Before you look back on the momentous happenings of 2013, come along with us on a tour of this year’s mostly lighter moments in news and politics.

Complete with links for more detail, here is our collection of 2013’s Bloopers, Gaffes, and Other Hot Messes.:
